# hatchR

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

**IN DEVELOPMENT**

The goal of hatchR is to allow users to leverage daily temperature records to predict when a fish is expected to hatch and/or emerge using statistical models

## Installation

You can install the development version of hatchR from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("bmait101/hatchR")
```
